about_the_game:
Blackwoods is a story focused FPS with short to medium-length levels, "bullet-time", weapon throwing mechanics and no weapon reloading to encourage scavenging and the use of enemy weapons.
You are "Hawk"- an untrained, partisan soldier with little weapon training so controlling the Cold-war era weapons is difficult and constant movement is encouraged.


Blackwoods takes place in an alternative history diverging shortly after the onset of the cold war. The resistance in the Baltic countries is not suppressed as readily early on which emboldens them and enables them to last far longer than they did in reality.
Decades later, the resistance is very close to being a private army with scavenged uniforms and weapons but lacking the training- however, the enemy will not simply sit idle and allow you to grow more powerful.


You will be joined in this fight by other members of the Blackwoods unit as well as some unknown characters who have simply been caught up in this battle.
The nature of this unit means nobody's true intentions can ever be known so who can you really trust when everything is on the line?


Use an array of popular period-appropriate weapons as well as some more rare and experimental weapons from throughout the cold war.
Over 40 different weapons can be collected and some may even be used akimbo to really give you some firepower!

content_descriptors.notes: Frequent violence and potentially offensive historical symbols.

name: Blackwoods

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-Core Intel or AMD 2.5 GHz or superior
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any DirectX 11 or 12 compatible card
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit (Version 20H2)
  • Processor: Six-Core Intel or AMD 5 GHz or superior
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2080 or equivalent
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Alternate history Cold war FPS. Join the Blackwoods unit and unravel a conspiracy which threatens to end your resistance once and for all.
